Text:
I have to mention as a matter of record - both Glenn Beck (argh) and Michael Savage predict an upcoming "event" and directly refer to the Reichstag Fire weekly, almost daily. Here's the ironic juxtaposition - 9/11 was a Reichstag Fire - which they both vehemently refuse to acknowledge and/or give honest intellectual cross examination.  Glenn Beck's latest self exhonerating propaganda, per last Friday's Aug. 8, '09  radio program, "I have awakened." 8 years too late Beck and Savage Judas Goats. The rest will probably be a matter of national and global exercise fools.
